nodes.text: Kiatha was a male Jawa who was active during the waning years of the Republic Classic era. In 32 BBY, he was wanted by Coruscant Police for mishandling a Ronto, resulting in extensive property damage. In 32 BBY, the bounty was claimed by the Mandalorian-turned Bounty hunter Jango Fett.
Kiatha's bounty is worth 1,000 credits alive and 500 credits dead.
